Class LoyaltyCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • LoyaltyCard

  • public class LoyaltyCard
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a loyalty card for a fictional university bookshop. Amended to include address functionality for the card.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Grant Allenby

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LoyaltyCard(java.lang.String theTitle, java.lang.String theFirstName, java.lang.String theLastName, java.lang.String street, java.lang.String town, java.lang.String postcode, java.lang.String theCardNumber)
      Constructor for objects of class LoyaltyCard where they obtain a card without purchasing any book(s) at that point.
      LoyaltyCard(java.lang.String theTitle, java.lang.String theFirstName, java.lang.String theLastName, java.lang.String street, java.lang.String town, java.lang.String postcode, java.lang.String theCardNumber, int thePoints)
      Constructor for objects of class Customer where they purchase a book(s) at the same time as they obtain their card.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LoyaltyCard

        public LoyaltyCard(java.lang.String theTitle,
                   java.lang.String theFirstName,
                   java.lang.String theLastName,
                   java.lang.String street,
                   java.lang.String town,
                   java.lang.String postcode,
                   java.lang.String theCardNumber)
        Constructor for objects of class LoyaltyCard where they obtain a card without purchasing any book(s) at that point. The number of points / spend should be set to 0.
        Parameters:
        theTitle - The customer's title
        theFirstName - The customer's first name
        theLastName - The customer's last name
        theCardNumber - The number for this card
        street - The street
        town - The town
        postcode - The postcode

      • LoyaltyCard

        public LoyaltyCard(java.lang.String theTitle,
                   java.lang.String theFirstName,
                   java.lang.String theLastName,
                   java.lang.String street,
                   java.lang.String town,
                   java.lang.String postcode,
                   java.lang.String theCardNumber,
                   int thePoints)
        Constructor for objects of class Customer where they purchase a book(s) at the same time as they obtain their card.
        Parameters:
        theTitle - The customer's title
        theFirstName - The customer's first name
        theLastName - The customer's last name
        theCardNumber - The number for this card
        street - The street
        town - The town
        postcode - The postcode
        thePoints - The number of points earned - could be zero.
